719.name: Brewery 719
719.description: At Brewery 719 we understand and appreciate a hard days work, especially when it comes to a craft brew from the heartland. Our work is a labor of love and we reap the fruits of our labor every day.

backswing.description: For the true beer drinker and beer novice alike, Backswing Brewing offers a break from the pretentiousness of craft beer by meticulously crafting easy-drinking, true-to-style beer.
backswing.name: Backswing

baseline.description: These are the popular beers that we use as a baseline to review craft beers from.
baseline.name: Baseline or Premium breweries

baseline.description: These are the popular beers that we use as a baseline to review craft beers from.

bottlerocket.name: Bottle Rocket
bottlerocket.description: Bottle Rocket has a  mission is to brew superior craft beer for patrons in Seward and throughout the Midwest.

brickway.name: Brickway
brickway.description: Since 2013, Brickway Brewery & Distillery has been brewing staple beers and whisky in the Historic Old Market District.

code.description: Located in the Telegraph District in Lincoln, Nebraska, Code Beer is laid-back place to try great new brews.
code.name: Code
code.breweryAddress: 200 S Antelope Valley Pkwy, Lincoln, NE

cosmiceye.name: Cosmic
cosmiceye.description: Cosmic Eye is a family owned brewery and tap room located at 6800 P ST Lincoln, NE.

empyrean.description: Empyrean Brewing Co. bgan in 1991 with a dream that they could hand-craft full-flavored beer. The dream became Nebraska’s first microbrewery, Empyrean Brewing Co.
empyrean.name: Empyrean

firststreet.description: First Street Brewing Co. is located in the heart of Downtown Hastings, Nebraska. We believe in making great beer that exemplifies truly regional flavors.
firststreet.breweryAddress: 119 N. Saint Joseph Ave., Hastings, NE
firststreet.name: 1st Street

flyover.name: Flyover
flyover.description: The first brewery in the Nebraska Panhandle, Flyover Brewing Company takes pride in brewing. Brewed by an award winning professional brewer with years of experience in the craft, the brewery produces both true to style lagers and ales along with innovative locally themed brews.

infusion.description: Infusion Brewery now occupies the former home of Olson’s Meat Market in Downtown Benson. When the building became available, Bill Baburek, owner of Omaha’s Crescent Moon, decided to turn his dream of opening a craft brewery into reality.
infusion.name: Infusion

kinkaider.name: Kinkaider
kinkaider.description: We are a Farm Craft Brewery with locations is Lincoln, Grand Island, and Broken Bow. Stop by our 3 locations and enjoy our award-winning beers!

krosstrain.locationDescription: On Portal Road in La Vista, NE
krosstrain.name: Kros Strain
krosstrain.description: Two dudes with a passion for brewing great beers, founders Bobby Kros and Scott Strain, started Kros Strain Brewing. Known to innovate, the pair will tinker with recipes, until it’s not just “good enough” – but until it’s freaking great.

lazyhorse.description: Nested in the Nebraska Heartland, come enjoy its rural beauty and unique selection of beers.
lazyhorse.name: Lazy Horse

luckybucket.name: Lucky Bucket
luckybucket.locationDescription: On Centennial Road in La Vista, NE
luckybucket.description: Hoppy libations, barrel aged ales, bold stouts, tart sour beers – you name it, ucky Bucket brews it!

nebrew.name: Nebraska Brewing
nebrew.locationDescription: On 108th Street in La Vista, NE
nebrew.description: With a foundation in homebrewing in 1992, Paul Kavulak set about to experiment within a hobby that would prove to change the landscape of Nebraska Craft Beer.

pintnine.name: Pint Nine
pintnine.locationDescription: On Portal Road in La Vista, NE
pintnine.description: Located in La Vista, Pint Nine is commited to tradition and innovation.

prairiepride.name: Prairie Pride
prairiepride.description: We believe, with great pride, that craft beer is an attitude and that flavor favors the bold. That bold attitude is what led us to imagine the Hopffalo as the perfect symbol for our mutual pride of place and love of craft beer.
prairiepride.breweryAddress: 115 E South Front St, Suite 1 Grand Island, NE

thunderhead.locationDescription: On F Ave in Axtell, NE.
thunderhead.description: Founded in 1999, Thunderhead Brewing is a small brewmaster owned brewery dedicated to producing high quality ales and lagers.
thunderhead.name: Thunderhead

whiteelm.name: White Elm
whiteelm.description: White Elm Brewing Company strives to bring modern takes on rustic ales to southeast Nebraska.

zipline.description: Zipline Brewing Co. crafts artisan ales and lagers with high quality precision in Lincoln, Nebraska. Born from the founders’ innate sense of adventure and their desire to connect with the thrill-seeking spirit in all craft beer fans.
zipline.name: Zipline

applebees-gateway.storeAddress: 6100 O St Suite C318, Lincoln, NE
applebees-gateway.name: Applebee's - Gateway Mall

caseys-1.name: Casey's - S 13th & E
caseys-1.description: Casey's on S 13th St, right by the capitol in downtown Lincoln.

caseys-13.storeAddress: 3500 N 48th St Ste 1 Ste 1, Lincoln, NE
caseys-13.name: Casey's - N 48th Street

caseys-7.description: Casey's on Woodlawn Road, Northwest Lincoln.
caseys-7.name: Casey's - Woodlawn Road

charred-burger-bar.storeAddress: 2910 Pine Lake Rd N, Lincoln, NE
charred-burger-bar.name: Charred Burger & Bar

discount-city-1.name: Discount City
discount-city-1.description: Discount City is located on S 48th and Hwy 2.

etos-liquor.description: Eto's Liquor is conveniently located on 11th and G near the capitol building and has selection of wine, liquor, beer and spirits.
etos-liquor.locationDescription: Near the state capitol by 11th and G
etos-liquor.name: Eto's Liquor

gitnspit.description: Sinclair ocated On W O Street.
gitnspit.name: Git N Spit- W O St

hyvee-3.name: Hyvee - Village Dr
hyvee-3.description: Hyvee near S 40th and Old Cheney Rd.

hyvee-4.name: Hyvee - Stacy Lane
hyvee-4.description: Hyvee near S 70th and Pioneers Blvd.

hyvee-5.description: Hyvee on N 84th Street and Holdrege.
hyvee-5.name: Hyvee - N 84th St

juicy-lous-bar.name: Juicy Lou's Burgeria and Sports Bar

kwikshop-1.description: Kiwk Shop on the corner of 14th and Adams.
kwikshop-1.name: Kwik Shop - N 14th St
kwikshop-1.locationDescription: On the corner of 14th and Adams

kwikshop-10.name: Kwik Shop - Cotner St
kwikshop-10.description: Kwik Shop on N Cotner Blvd.

leons.name: Leon’s Gourmet Grocer
leons.description: Leon's Gourmet Grocer on Winthrop Rd off South St.

meatandbeer.description: Meat and Beers on 11th St off Cornhusker Hwy
meatandbeer.name: Meat and Beers

moran-1.name: Moran's Liquor Works
moran-1.description: Moran is located on 40th and A.

mums-liquor.name: Mum's Liquor
mums-liquor.description: Mum's Liquor is located on O and N 22nd Street.

n-street.description: N Street is located right off of O Street.
n-street.name: N Street Liquor

ollie-hobbes.name: Ollie & Hobbes Craft Kitchen
ollie-hobbes.storeAddress: 2940 Pine Lake Rd STE A, Lincoln, NE

playmakers-bar-grill.name: Playmakers Bar & Grill
playmakers-bar-grill.storeAddress: 640 W Prospector Ct Suite 300, Lincoln, NE

press-box-bar.name: The Press Box Sports Bar & Grille

pumppantry-1.name: Pump & Pantry
pumppantry-1.description: Pump & Pantry on South Street and Sun Valley Blvd.

russs-2.name: Russ’s Market - Coddington & West A
russs-2.description: Russ's on S Coddington Ave in Lincoln, NE.

russs-6.description: Russ's on Guildford St in Waverly, NE.
russs-6.name: Russ's Market Express - Waverly, NE

spot-spirits.storeAddress: 13851 Guildford St suite a, Waverly, NE
spot-spirits.name: Spot Spirits & Discount Tobacco

stopnshop-1.name: B & B, Stop N Shop - N 33rd St.

stopnshopne-5.name: Stop N Shop - W O St

supersaver-1.name: Super Saver - N 27th Street
supersaver-1.description: Supersaver on N 27th and Cornhusker Hwy.

u-stop-1.name: U-Stop - S 10th St
u-stop-1.locationDescription: Right by the courthouse on 10th Street

upside-bar-lounge.name: The Upside Bar & Lounge
upside-bar-lounge.storeAddress: 2801 Pine Lake Rd Suite H, Lincoln, NE

watering-hole-west.name: The Watering Hole - West
watering-hole-west.storeAddress: 1550 S Coddington Ave Suite P, Lincoln, NE

wine-bar-spirit-1.name: Wine, Beer, and Spirits Lincoln
wine-bar-spirit-1.description: Wine, Beer, and Spirits is located on N 27th in the Lincoln Crossing Plaza.

wings-rings-o-lnk.name: Buffalo Wings and Rings - E O St

backswing:apple-wheat.name: Apple Wheat Ale
backswing:apple-wheat.description: Apple juice from the Pacific Northwest combined with unfiltered wheat beer to form a unique cider-beer hybrid.

backswing:backspin.name: Backspin
backswing:backspin.description: A wheat beer- email us your description.

backswing:brown.description: Styled after the English brown, Backswing Brown is a great, year-round ale. With hints of chocolate, this easy drinking brown ale is dark in color and rich in flavor.
backswing:brown.name: Brown

backswing:bugeater.description: A light, grainy-sweet Golden Ale is brewed in support of Omaha's soccer team, Bugeaters FC.
backswing:bugeater.name: Bugeater Goalden Ale

backswing:citra-kolsch.name: Citra Kolsch
backswing:citra-kolsch.description: Traditional style Kolsch with a twist: Americanized with Citra hops, light-bodies, light in color, with a hint of tropical fruits.

backswing:ipa.name: IPA
backswing:ipa.description: An English-style IPA. Heavy-handed on the hops, but tempered with a malty-sweet caramel finish - Dry-hopped and flavorful, with our IPA it's all in the Backswing.

backswing:oatmeal-stout.description: Dark, roasty, and light-bodied. Made with chocolate and roasted malts to produce flavors like chocolate and coffee.
backswing:oatmeal-stout.name: Oatmeal Stout

backswing:scottish.description: Having toffee and roasted malt flavors combined with a slight hop presence, our take on the '80 Schilling' will transport you to the deep Lochs and rolling green hills of the Scottish Highlands. Enjoy this malt forward, clean finishing, easy drinking ale that is perfect for mild weather or long cool nights with friends.
backswing:scottish.name: Scottish Ale

backswing:wheat.description: Brewed with German wheat, malt, and finished with an American ale yeast. It’s clean and crisp with a touch of orange flavor from the Pacifica hops we use to brew this unfiltered beer.
backswing:wheat.name: Wheat

baseline:ab-becks.description: One of the world's most popular German beer. Golden colour, with a distinctive aroma. Rich in hop and malt.
baseline:ab-becks.name: Beck's

baseline:bb-hazers-gonna-haze.description: We went through a lot of iterations of our best hazy IPAs to bring you the best of the best with Hazers Gonna Haze. The foundation of our hazy IPA is based on a rounded mouthfeel to emphasize and highlight the tropical fruit and juicy flavors and aromas from the hops. The result is a juice bomb of crushable proportions.
baseline:bb-hazers-gonna-haze.name: Hazers Gonna Haze

baseline:bb-mosaic-ipa.description: Brewed with 100% Mosaic hops this beer is packed with complex aromas showcasing crushed grapes, citrus, passion fruit and grape fruit. The finish is dry and slightly sweet.
baseline:bb-mosaic-ipa.name: Mosaic Double IPA

baseline:bb-no-worries.description: No Worries IPA is the epitome of a true West Coast IPA, but with a twist of modern-day hops & aromas. This hop forward West Coast ale pours clear with a nice bubbly head. Aromas of dankness and tropical fruit jump from the glass. The first sip will tingle your taste buds, and as the bitterness mellows the hop flavors take over. This crisp, balanced ale will grasp at your senses and surely enlighten your day.
baseline:bb-no-worries.hops: Strata, Galaxy, Mosaic, Citra, and Amarillo
baseline:bb-no-worries.name: No Worries IPA

baseline:bb-phantom-bride.description: Named after the ethereal song by the one and only Deftones, Phantom Bride IPA is a blend of Amarillo, Citra, Simcoe and Mosaic hops delicately balanced for the perfectly drinkable mix of citrus and hoppy goodness. A truly original Deftones/ Belching Beaver collaboration envisioned by Chino Moreno and skillfully crafted by Thomas Peters. Sit back, put on your headphones and drink away.
baseline:bb-phantom-bride.name: Deftones Phantom Bride Release

baseline:bluemoon.name: Blue Moon
baseline:bluemoon.description: A wheat beer brewed with orange peel for a subtle sweetness and bright, citrus aroma.

baseline:boulevard-wheat.name: Unfiltered Wheat
baseline:boulevard-wheat.description: A lively, refreshing ale with a natural citrusy flavor and distinctive cloudy appearance. This easy drinking American-style wheat beer has become the company's most popular offering, and the best-selling craft beer in the Midwest.
baseline:boulevard-wheat.malts: Malted wheat, Pale Malt, Raw Wheat

baseline:breckenridge-avalanche.name: Aavlanche Amber Ale
baseline:breckenridge-avalanche.description: This classic American amber blends pale, chocolate, and caramel malts in a well-rounded, flavorful beer. Caramel malts lend whispers of toffee sweetness, while a touch of bittering hops gives this beer its clean finish. Crafted for balance, Avalanche is a versatile and satisfying anytime beer.

baseline:breckenridge-vanilla-porter.description: Aromas of vanilla and toasted grain set the stage for mellow flavors of vanilla and dark roasted malts in this popular porter. Don't let its deep mahogany color fool you, this brew is packed with flavor, yet as smooth as they come.
baseline:breckenridge-vanilla-porter.name: Vanilla Porter

baseline:bud-light.name: Bud Light
baseline:bud-light.description: We carefully brew our beer to be perfect for anywhere there's fun – because when there's fun, there's a Bud Light there. Every bottle, can and draft of Bud Light uses four simple, high quality ingredients to create a clean, crisp taste.

baseline:bud-weiser.description: Budweiser is a medium-bodied, flavorful, crisp American-style lager. Brewed with the best barley malt and a blend of premium hop varieties.
baseline:bud-weiser.name: Lager

baseline:cigar-city-jai-alai-ipa.name: Jai Alai IPA
baseline:cigar-city-jai-alai-ipa.description: Jai Alai IPA is a bold, citrusy and balanced India Pale Ale that involves six different hop varietals used in ABV beer. Look for notes of orange peel, clementine, and light caramel to share the story and sunshine of Florida with beer lovers across the globe.

baseline:corona-extra.name: Corna Extra
baseline:corona-extra.description: With a refreshing, smooth taste balanced between heavier European imports and lighter domestic beer, Corona Extra is an even-keeled cerveza made for the beach, the backyard, or whatever you’re feeling.

baseline:dale-pale-ale.description: Defiant, proud, voluminously hopped mutha of a pale ale. This is Oskar Blues best selling brew, dubbed The Original Craft Beer in a Can.
baseline:dale-pale-ale.name: Dale's Pale Ale

baseline:deschutes-fresh-haze-ipa.name: Fresh Haze IPA
baseline:deschutes-fresh-haze-ipa.malts: 2 Row, Munich, Crystal, Wheat, Flaked Barley
baseline:deschutes-fresh-haze-ipa.description: Soak up the soft golden rays of an inviting malt body as the lively hues of citrusy hops linger on the horizon of a cool, refreshing finish.

baseline:deschutes-fresh-squeezed-ipa.name: Fresh Squeezed IPA
baseline:deschutes-fresh-squeezed-ipa.description: Savor every last drop of tropical refreshment with this juicy blend of citrusy hops balanced by a lively malt body.

baseline:founders-all-day-ipa.name: All Day IPA
baseline:founders-all-day-ipa.description: eeps your taste satisfied while keeping your senses sharp. An all-day IPA naturally brewed with a complex array of malts, grains and hops. Balanced for optimal aromatics and a clean finish. The perfect reward for an honest day’s work and the ultimate companion to celebrate life’s simple pleasures.

baseline:gd-yeti-imperial-stout.description: Yeti Imperial Stout is an onslaught of the senses. It starts with big, roasty malt flavor that gives way to rich caramel and toffee notes. Yeti gets its bold hop character from an enormous quantity of American hops.
baseline:gd-yeti-imperial-stout.name: Yeti

baseline:goose-island-ipa.name: IPA
baseline:goose-island-ipa.description: Goose Island’s flagship IPA is a six-time medal winner at the Great American Beer Festival. We’ve taken the traditional English Style and created our own fuller flavored IPA with bright citrus aromas and a bold hop finish. With hoppy, bold, and smooth flavor, Goose IPA is the perfect beer for hopheads and discovery drinkers alike.

baseline:goose-island-next-coast-ipa.description: Goose Island Next Coast IPA is a tropical and juicy IPA. Gently bitter and lightly sweet, this India pale ale has big, bracing, piney hop flavors. The balanced bitterness blends seamlessly into the light to medium body of this India pale ale beer.
baseline:goose-island-next-coast-ipa.name: Next Coast IPA

baseline:guinness-draught.name: Draught
baseline:guinness-draught.description: Perfect balance of bitter and sweet with malt and roast characters.

baseline:harp-lager.description: A rich, golden pilsner style lager which has an aroma filled with mild hop bitterness and subtle malts.
baseline:harp-lager.name: Lager

baseline:heineken.name: Lager
baseline:heineken.description: For over 150 years, a ceaseless commitment to purity and quality have made Heineken the most iconic beer brand in the world.  A tradition of taste that his lived on for over a century and a half thanks to the simplicity and quality of the ingredients and the meticulous attention to the brewing process.

baseline:lagunitas-ipa.name: IPA
baseline:lagunitas-ipa.description: This is our unique version of an ancient style. A style as old as the ocean trade routes of the last centuries of Great Ships.

baseline:leinie-summer-shandy.name: Summer Shandy
baseline:leinie-summer-shandy.description: Our own unique take on Franz Kugler’s original Munich tavern tradition. Leinenkugel’s Summer Shandy is our traditional weiss beer with refreshing natural lemonade flavor that makes it the perfect summer beer.

baseline:michelob-ultra.name: Ultra
baseline:michelob-ultra.description: Michelob ULTRA is the Superior Light Beer brewed for those who understand that it's only worth it if you enjoy it. Containing only 95 calories and 2.6 carbs, Michelob ULTRA is a light lager brewed with the perfect balance of Herkules hops and wholesome grains, producing a light citrus aroma and a crisp, refreshing finish.

baseline:miller-hl.description: A favorite among bartenders, brewers, and beer lovers in general, Miller High Life was launched as Miller Brewing Company’s flagship beer in 1903. Its crisp, easy-drinking flavor is the epitome of the American lager category. True to its original recipe, it’s brewed with a proprietary blend of malted barley, hops from the Pacific Northwest, and Miller yeast.
baseline:miller-hl.name: Miller High Life

baseline:modelo.name: Modelo Especial
baseline:modelo.description: Well-balanced taste and light hop character with a crisp, clean finish. Modelo Especial is characterized by an orange blossom honey aroma with a hint of herb. Modelo Especial contains Water, Barley Malt, Non-malted Cereals and Hops.

baseline:nb-fat-tire.description: Fat Tire delivers drinkers everywhere a flavorful, balanced beer with a fresh herbal hop profile, fine malt presence and a touch of fruity yeast, making it a timeless beer with broad appeal.
baseline:nb-fat-tire.name: Fat Tire

baseline:nb-vd-exp-ipa-5.name: Voodoo Xperimental IPA 5
baseline:nb-vd-exp-ipa-5.description: Our next experiment is a bright citrusy IPA brewed with Galaxy hops

baseline:nb-vd-hop-avenger.description: With its super juicy tropical aromas and light sweetness, Hop Avenger IPA packs a powerful pineapple punch!
baseline:nb-vd-hop-avenger.name: Voodoo Hop Avenger IPA

baseline:nb-vd-ipa.description: Bursting with tropical aromas and juicy fruit flavors from Mosaic and Amarillo hops, this golden IPA is perfectly bitter with a refreshing, sublime finish
baseline:nb-vd-ipa.name: Voodoo IPA
baseline:nb-vd-ipa.hops: Amarillo, Cascade, Mosaic, Chinook, HBC 522, Mosaic, Strata, Citra

baseline:nb-vd-juicy-haze-ipa.description: Packed with bright tropical aromas and brilliant citrusy flavors, this hazy IPA wraps up with a pleasantly smooth finish.
baseline:nb-vd-juicy-haze-ipa.name: Voodoo Juicy Haze IPA

baseline:new-castle-brown.name: Brown Ale
baseline:new-castle-brown.description: Newcastle Brown Ale is a brown ale, originally brewed in Newcastle upon Tyne, England. Launched in 1927 by Colonel Jim Porter after three years of development, the 1960 merger of Newcastle Breweries with Scottish Brewers afforded the beer national distribution and sales peaked in the United Kingdom in the early 1970s.

baseline:pbr.description: Always good for all the time.
baseline:pbr.name: Original Lager

baseline:rolling-rock.name: Rolling Rock
baseline:rolling-rock.description: Using a time-honored recipe with only the finest malted barley and blend of hops, Rolling Rock is a classic American lager that is as well-known for its distinctive, full-bodied taste as it is for its craftsmanship, heritage and green bottle

baseline:sa-wicked-hazy-ipa.malts: Samuel Adams two-row pale malt blend, White Wheat, Golden Nakes Oats
baseline:sa-wicked-hazy-ipa.description: Super-juiced with haze for days. How about a rush of pineapple over here? How about a one-two punch of mango and peach over there? Wicked Hazy is a little bit extra - a blast of tropical fruit, with a smooth, silky finish. It’s like a beautiful swirling magic-eye for your mouth, if that makes sense. Drink up, it will soon.
baseline:sa-wicked-hazy-ipa.name: Wicked Hazy IPA

baseline:sd-boston-lager.description: Distinctive Balance of Spicy Hops, Slightly Sweet Roasted Malts, and a smooth finish.
baseline:sd-boston-lager.malts: Samuel Adams two-row pale malt blend and Caramel 60
baseline:sd-boston-lager.hops: Hallertau Mittelfrüh and Tettnang Tettnanger Noble Hops
baseline:sd-boston-lager.name: Boston Lager

baseline:sierra-atomic-torpedo.description: Fused in this Double IPA, their hop flavors span lush fruit, sticky pine, and floral tones. It’s our classic IPA transformed—soft yet assertive, approachable yet atomic.
baseline:sierra-atomic-torpedo.name: Atomic Torpedo IPA

baseline:sierra-dankful-ipa.description: A better tomorrow is why we brew Dankful, a resinous West Coast IPA that supports nonprofits standing up for social equality, economic well-being, and environmental protection. Through this philanthropic pledge, we work with nonprofit partners dedicated to moving our communities forward. We’re Dankful for that.
baseline:sierra-dankful-ipa.name: Dankful IPA
baseline:sierra-dankful-ipa.hops: Columbus, Chinook, Ekuanot, Idaho 7, Mosaic, Nelson Sauvin, Zappa

baseline:sierra-pale-ale.description: Heavy on hops, that was always the brewery plan. So in 1980, we loaded Pale Ale up with Cascade—a new hop at the time named after the mountain range—and the intense aromas of pine and citrus sparked the American craft beer revolution.
baseline:sierra-pale-ale.name: Pale Ale

baseline:sierra-torpedo.name: Torpedo IPA
baseline:sierra-torpedo.description: We built the sketch, and the Hop Torpedo revolutionized dry hopping and inspired Torpedo, one of our favorite IPA style beers. It’s an aggressive yet balanced beer featuring the complex citrus, pine, and herbal character of whole-cone hops.

baseline:stella-artois-lager.name: Lager
baseline:stella-artois-lager.description: With its wonderful floral aroma, well-balanced malt sweetness, crisp hop bitterness, and a soft dry finish, Stella Artois is the perfect beer to pair with food and friends. Winner of the 2019 World Beer Award for World’s Best International Lager.

bottlerocket:blonde.name: Blonde
bottlerocket:blonde.description: Easy drinking, smooth and amazing flavor are some of the terms used by visitors in our taproom. This beer has been a project of our brew masters for over a year, to fine tune a great beer. It has become our best selling beer in the taproom since it's launch. It is a great beer for any occasion, time of year or paired with most foods.

bottlerocket:blueberry-bomb.name: Blueberry Bomb
bottlerocket:blueberry-bomb.description: More beer than it is a blueberry beer. The flavor in this beer is more like a subtle spark than an explosion

bottlerocket:golden-stout.name: Golden Stout
bottlerocket:golden-stout.description: Deceiving in color, this contracdiction of a stout is brewed with light, biscuit malt and Indian Malabar coffee - from our local JD's coffee shop - to give it a rich flavor and golden hue... A perfection reflection of Nebraska's golden summer and stout winters.

bottlerocket:m-80.name: M-80
bottlerocket:m-80.description: The M-80 has explosive flavor without the hard bitter hit of an IPA. It carries a high bitter rating, but is very refreshing and easy on the taste buds. This is a beer that our Mug Club members picked as a favorite and we decided to add it to our list of cornerstone beers. For many of our taproom regulars, this is a go to beer.

bottlerocket:thefourth.description: An easy drinking crisp lager made with barley, hops, and, of course, corn.
bottlerocket:thefourth.name: The Fourth

bottlerocket:wickedspark.name: Wicked Spark
bottlerocket:wickedspark.description: a wheat IPA that has great hoppy flavor, but with smoothness of a wheat ale

brickway:ginger.name: Ginger Beer
brickway:ginger.description: A non-alcoholic beverage with a hint of ginger freshness.

brickway:hef.description: True to a German-style wheat, slightly sweet grain maltiness with balanced notes of clove and banana
brickway:hef.name: Hef

brickway:jalapeno.description: Our base pilsner with over 20lbs of fresh sliced jalapeno and loads of sweet Hawaiian pineapple puree. It tastes like gold and it won gold in 2019!
brickway:jalapeno.name: Jalapeno Pineapple Pilsner

brickway:juicyipa.description: A hazier, juicier version of the One Way IPA, double dry hopped with Galaxy hops
brickway:juicyipa.name: Juicy IPA

brickway:oktoberfest.name: Oktoberfest
brickway:oktoberfest.description: Full flavored lager with a hint of bitterness.

brickway:pils.description: A crisp lager with soft Noble-type hops for a refeshing clean finish.
brickway:pils.name: Pilsner

brickway:raspberry-hef.description: Notes of maple syrup, toffee, nutty pecans, and roasted malt. Medium bodied with a sweet, semi-dry finish.
brickway:raspberry-hef.name: Raspberry Hefeweizen

brickway:stout.name: Coffee Vanilla Stout
brickway:stout.description: Oatmeal milk stout with real vanilla and over 40lbs of cold steeped coffee per batch. *contains lactose

code:berrylemon.name: Berry Lemon Sour
code:berrylemon.description: Wheat-based sour ale using lactobacillus and fruited with lots of blueberry and lemon. The combination of fruit kicks up the tartness of the beer.

code:continuous.name: Continuous Wave
code:continuous.description: Light and clean malt flavor with a hint of corn (from flaked corn) and a very subtle noble hop character. Nebraska-grown grains and hops make this beer truly a Nebraska grown ale.

code:elmo.name: Elmo IPA
code:elmo.description: El Dorado and Mosaic hops provide plenty of tropical and stone fruit aroma and flavor with a bit of a dank edge. It’s easy bitterness and smooth body will make you want more than one!

cosmiceye:basilisk.description: This German style black lager, or 'Schwarzbier,' starts crisp and ends roasty and smooth. Fans of porters and stouts are likely to enjoy this one.
cosmiceye:basilisk.name: Gaze of the Basilisk

cosmiceye:call-of-wolf-mama.name: Call of the Wolf Mama
cosmiceye:call-of-wolf-mama.description: This one will make you howl at the moon. Pilsner malt, oats and corn. Hopped singly and intensely with Styrian Wolf hops, undertones of tropical fruit with prominent strawberry aromas and flavors.

cosmiceye:deadmansrun.description: This American style lager is Cosmic Eye's version of a beer-beer. Made with 50% corn and late additions of saaz hops, it is crisp, light and refreshing.
cosmiceye:deadmansrun.name: Deadman's Run

cosmiceye:eyes.name: Everything has Eyes
cosmiceye:eyes.description: This New England style post-haze IPA brings stone fruits & citrus flavors without all the pulpy residue. Large additions of oats for a rounded mouthfeel along with generous and dry hop additions of simcoe and cascade hops.

cosmiceye:festbier.description: Cosmic eye beer sited first at south street liquor
cosmiceye:festbier.name: Festbier

cosmiceye:floyd.name: Floyd Wants to Party
cosmiceye:floyd.description: Easy drinking summer lager! Light and crisp with robust flavors of raspberry. Brewed with only Pilsner Malt & Monroe Hops. This seasonal lager will only be in rotation for a few months, get it while you can!

cosmiceye:forgetting.description: This beer was brewed in collaboration with our friends Spotlights to celebrate their last album, Love & Decay and the lives of friends past.
cosmiceye:forgetting.name: The Beauty of Forgetting

cosmiceye:friend-death.name: Your Friend Death
cosmiceye:friend-death.description: This Imperial Stout is about as dark as you can get. 100% malt, no additional sugars or flavorings. Deep and lasting flavors of coffee, chocolate, and roasted malts.

cosmiceye:laser-2.name: Laser Quest 2.0
cosmiceye:laser-2.description: Aptly named after those who came before us. Laser Quest 2.0 is an upgrade of tenants previously occupying our space (if you ask us). This one drinks like a fine Rosè and includes an addition of hibiscus bringing a beautiful pink color - that remind us of lasers and smoke machines.

cosmiceye:open-hearted.name: Open Hearted
cosmiceye:open-hearted.description: Our newest Pale Lager. Made with Pilsner Malt and a brand new hop, 'Emrald Spire'. Perfect for enoying or dreaming of warmer weather. Delicate with notes of white grape, peach, melon, and honey.

cosmiceye:sir-limes-a-lot.name: Sir Limes-A-Lot
cosmiceye:sir-limes-a-lot.description: True to it's name this beer brings the limes to the party! If you're a margarita fan, you'll love this beer. Sour Ale with Lime, Salt, and Coriander. Aged on Oak.

cosmiceye:straightsun.description: Dailed down ABV but with all the hops. Amarillo and strisslepalt hops provide notes of citrus and spice. The ultimate summer staple.
cosmiceye:straightsun.name: Straight for the Sun

cosmiceye:unlock-the-time-dragon.description: Leans west-coast with a simple grain bill and clean fermentation allowing the hops to shine through. Lots of hop flavor and restrained bitterness. Flavors of orange, grapefruit, and pine.
cosmiceye:unlock-the-time-dragon.name: Unlock the Time Dragon

empyrean:aries-marzen.name: Aries Marzen Oktoberfest
empyrean:aries-marzen.description: A clean and balanced presentation of malty sweetness with a refreshing herbal hop finish. There's an Oktoberfest in every sip. Best enjoyed with savory pork dishes, slow-grilled meats, bold cheeses and smoked game.

empyrean:burning-skye-scottish.description: Brewed in the tradition of Scotland's malty-sweet beers. Sweet and smooth with a wee hint of smoked character. Pair with grilled chicken, beef, BBQ or wild game.
empyrean:burning-skye-scottish.name: Burning Skye Scottish
empyrean:burning-skye-scottish.malts: 2-Row, Honey, Smoked, Biscuit, Caramel 60 and Midnight Wheat

empyrean:chaco-canyon-gold.name: Chaco Canyon Gold
empyrean:chaco-canyon-gold.malts: 2-Row, Caramel Munich, Caramel 60 and Euro Pils
empyrean:chaco-canyon-gold.description: We brew this easy-going golden ale with a bit of Nebraska honey for a unique, sweet-yet-dry character, balanced with a crisp hop finish. Pair with fried foods, Southwest cuisine and grilled chicken or fish.

empyrean:dark-side.malts: 2-Row, Caramel 60, Midnight Wheat, Aromatic and Roast
empyrean:dark-side.description: An infusion of old-world beer and contemporary soul. Smooth, dark and roasted with highlights of chocolate, coffee and vanilla. Pair with beef, Indian or Asian cuisine and chocolate or vanilla desserts.
empyrean:dark-side.name: Dark Side Vanilla Porter

empyrean:long-route.description: With delightful aroma of peanut butter cup, this beer maintains a porter backbone with twisting layers of chocolate, peanut butter and toast. An appealing balance of beer and peanut butter candy flavors. Pairs well with grilled meats, curry, Thai, baked apples and chocolate desserts.
empyrean:long-route.name: Long Route Peanut Butter Porter
empyrean:long-route.line1: Artificial Peanut Butter Flavoring (non-allergenic), Flaked Oats and Lactose (Milk Sugar)
empyrean:long-route.malts: Maris Otter, Biscuit, Dark Crystal, Roast and Midnight Wheat

empyrean:luna-sea.name: Luna Sea
empyrean:luna-sea.description: Extra Special Bitter is our homage to the best of English beers. Brewed with imported English malts for a bold, caramel-sweet, yet crisp ale. So balanced, it's lunacy! Pair with grilled steak, salmon, BBQ, wild game and caramel desserts.

empyrean:mind-over-mango.name: Mind Over Mango
empyrean:mind-over-mango.description: Hush. Hush. Listen and find stillness to receive the mindful union of bitter hops and sweet mango, symbols of health, wealth and immortality. This brut style IPA pairs well with beef, BBQ, grilled salmon and fruity desserts.

empyrean:pitched-blue.description: Find your thrill... Navigate the cosmos and awaken your senses to fresh blueberry and biscuit malts with subtle, stimulating dark notes. Our newest late-summer seasonal pairs well with grilled fish, ice cream and creme brulee.
empyrean:pitched-blue.malts: 2-Row, Munich, Caramel 60, Honey Malt, Carafa III, Flaked Barley
empyrean:pitched-blue.name: Pitched Blue Black & Blueberry Ale

empyrean:sun-slinger.description: Plunge face-first into a cool, desert mirage, dripping with sunshine citrus and lemonade highlights. Warm, dry-hop aromas and flavors vibrate around you. A wheat-centered pale ale, generously dry-hopped for effect. Pale and crisp with lemon citrus highlights. Emerge refreshed, without the carbs or calories. Keep on ridin', long after the sun goes down.
empyrean:sun-slinger.name: SunSlinger XPA

empyrean:super-nova.description: The backbone of smooth Pilsner malt and touch of sharp Rye complement the finish: a candy-citrus and fruit character from our blend of Amarillo and Galaxy hops. Smooth and light-bodied like all good summer beers, Super Nova™ is a formula for the modern era.
empyrean:super-nova.name: Super Nova California Common

empyrean:third-stone-brown.description: A myth-shattering ale that proves all dark beers don't have to be filling. Sweetly smooth with nutty hints of roasted caramel flavor. Pair with grilled beef or vegetables, Southwest cuisine and caramel desserts.
empyrean:third-stone-brown.name: Third Stone Brown

empyrean:watch-man-ipa.hops: Grown in Nebraska -- Nugget, Columbus, Cashmere and Centennial
empyrean:watch-man-ipa.name: Watch Man IPA
empyrean:watch-man-ipa.description: Serving as an ancient navigational pointer and constructed from unworked stones in the likeness of a human, INUKSHUK means, “you are on the right path.” Watch Man IPA keeps the bitterness firm but in check, and it is accented by floral and citrus notes from the hops. Pair with flaky grilled fish, creamy pastas and hearty salads.

empyrean:zookeeper-pink-guava.description: As the Lincoln Children’s Zoo reopens to members and the public, a brand-new beer hits store shelves with proceeds supporting the Zoo’s expansion project. Named Zookeeper Pink Guava Pale Ale, this fierce, limited-edition brew offers a light, refreshing body with an exotic twist due to the addition of fresh guava puree. This sweet-natured pale ale has a reputation for running wild.
empyrean:zookeeper-pink-guava.name: Zookeeper Pink Guava

flyover:blackbird.description: Dark German lager with a lighter body, smooth roast character and a crisp finish.
flyover:blackbird.name: Blackbird Schwarzbier

flyover:hellcat.description: Easy drinking lager with a pleasant pilsner malt sweetness and fresh noble hop aroma.
flyover:hellcat.name: Hellcat Helles

flyover:npa.name: Nebraska Pale Ale
flyover:npa.description: A somewhat hazy & fruity, strong pale ale. The hops create juicy apricot, over-ripe mango and orange zest flavor with a mild bitterness into the finish.

infusion:brown.description: Slight roast, brilliant toasted brown sugar flavor with nice chocolate and light carmel backbone to the malt. Pours with a light tan head.
infusion:brown.name: Dominican Brown Ale

infusion:cucumber-lime.description: Some things just go together like peas and carrots but maybe not in a seltzer. We opted for fresh cucumber and lime, you’re welcome.
infusion:cucumber-lime.name: Cucumber Lime Hard Seltzer

infusion:pineapple-mango.description: Pineapples, mangoes and bubbles, OH MY! Full of flavors that pack a punch, this hard seltzer takes you to a tropical paradise
infusion:pineapple-mango.name: Pineapple Mango Hard Seltzer

infusion:pineapplecoconut.name: Pineapple Coconut Vanilla Bean Blonde
infusion:pineapplecoconut.description: Our Vanilla Bean Blonde ale with Pineapples and Coconut.

infusion:pistachio.description: Brewed with English malts and a generous amount of cocoa powder. This beer is warming and full bodied. As the brew warms, the chocolate character and sweetness rolls out of the top of the glass.
infusion:pistachio.name: Pistachio Porter

infusion:radial.description: Radial is Infusion's way of thanking the West Coast for providing us with an incredible IPA. This Brash beer is light in color and packed full of hoppy goodness. With over 22 pounds of American hops, this should please even the craziest hophead.
infusion:radial.name: Radial IPA

infusion:squatcho.name: El Squatcho Mexican Lager
infusion:squatcho.description: It goes by many names, but around here it's El Squatcho. Rumored to quench even the biggest of thirsts, this Mexican style lager is light, crisp and crushable.

infusion:vanilla-bean.name: Vanilla Bean Blonde Ale
infusion:vanilla-bean.description: This blonde ale is smooth with vanilla and Bready notes. Hopped only to balance the beer, this is an easy drinking ale.

infusion:vbb-mexican.description: To celebrate our seventh birthday we decided to have some fun with our flagship beer, replacing the usual Madagascar vanilla with Mexican vanilla for a fun twist on an old favorite. Rich, creamy with big notes of cinnamon we think you will enjoy this liquid birthday cake!
infusion:vbb-mexican.name: Infusion Mexican Vanilla Bean Blonde Ale
infusion:vbb-mexican.beers: Infusion Mexican Vanilla Bean Blonde Ale

infusion:vbb-pumpkin.description: Nothing welcomes fall quite like the flavors of pumpkin and spice. Our classic Vanilla Bean Blonde has been blended with a generous addition of smooth pumpkin goodness and a hint of spice for a perfect fall time treat.
infusion:vbb-pumpkin.name: Pumpkin Vanilla Bean

infusion:wild-white-peach.description: Take a bite out of this juicy peach! This invigorating seltzer brings out subtle hints of peach. If I had my little way, I’d drink Wild White Peach Seltzer every day.
infusion:wild-white-peach.name: Wild White Peach Hard Seltzer

kinkaider:4-county.name: 4-County
kinkaider:4-county.description: Our new recipe uses 4 hop varieties that provide plenty of citrus aroma and flavor. The malt backbone supports a mild bitterness making this a perfect beer for any occasion.

kinkaider:bangarang.name: Bangarang
kinkaider:bangarang.description: This New England Style IPA is the newest addition to Kinkaider's IPA lineup.

kinkaider:dan-the-wiser.description: Dan The Wiser is a German style ale that has some mild fruit like flavors and aroma.  An all-around great beer to be enjoyed just about anywhere, anytime.  Dan likes to pour himself one after a dusty ride on his iron steed.
kinkaider:dan-the-wiser.name: Dan the Wiser

kinkaider:dan-wiser-peach.name: Dan the Wiser Peach Ale
kinkaider:dan-wiser-peach.description: Kinkaider Brewing Dan The Wiser is a German style ale that has some mild fruit like flavors and aroma. An all-around great beer to be enjoyed just about anywhere, anytime. Dan likes to pour himself one after a dusty ride on his iron steed.

kinkaider:devils-gap-j.name: Devil's Gap Jalapeño Ale
kinkaider:devils-gap-j.description: Our award winning jalapeno ale gives you an intense jalapeno flavor with a slightly heated finish and aroma.  The perfection in this beer will please both heat seekers and flavor chasers.  The beer that truly has something for everyone to enjoy.

kinkaider:dragon.name: Dragon Juice IPA
kinkaider:dragon.description: Bright, juicy tropical and citrus fruit flavors with strong hop aroma from Amarillo, El Dorado and Citra hops. Smooth, subtle bitterness and a clean finish.

kinkaider:frame-the-butcher.description: The Kinkaider well pulls up glorious Nebraska Sandhills water.  We merge that with the perfect blend of hops to give Frame the Butcher IPA a fresh aroma and a bright taste.
kinkaider:frame-the-butcher.name: Frame The Butcher

kinkaider:hail.description: Hail Ale is an easy-drinking, light ale brewed with Nebraska corn and lightly hopped! Light enough for sweltering September Saturdays in Nebraska and enough flavor to last all season. A collaboration between Kinkaider Brewing Co. and Hail Varsity. Go Big Red!
kinkaider:hail.name: Hail Ale

kinkaider:herd-blackberry.name: Herd's Law Blackberry Wheat
kinkaider:herd-blackberry.description: Dark wheat ale with blackberry puree added.

kinkaider:herd-law.description: A beautiful golden American wheat ale dosed with honey harvested from hives right off the farm.  The spent grains fed to the cattle next to the hives.  A fantastic drinking experience that is farm fresh and full circle.
kinkaider:herd-law.line2: light, crisp, and slightly malty taste
kinkaider:herd-law.name: Herd Law

kinkaider:hirams-bones.description: The Imperial Porter pours pitch black with an exceptional bourbon nose. Complex yet extremely easy to drink. You will taste a light oaky flavor from the barrel along with roasted coffee, dark chocolate, slight vanilla, caramel & a strong bourbon flavor with none of the alcohol burn of whiskey.
kinkaider:hirams-bones.name: Barrel Aged Hiram Bones Pack

kinkaider:j-raspberry.name: Devil's Gap Rasberry
kinkaider:j-raspberry.description: Devil's Gap Jalapeño Ale with Raspberries added. Slightly spicy and sweet.

kinkaider:oktoberfest.name: Oktoberfest
kinkaider:oktoberfest.description: A nod to the German Festbier, this fresh pale lager has a strong malt backbone and a clean finish. It's the perfect beer to welcome the change of the seasons and anticipate harvest time.

kinkaider:radler.name: Grapefruit Radler
kinkaider:radler.description: An easy drinking wheat blended with freshly brewed grapefruit soda makes for a crushable beer after a day of biking.

kinkaider:snow-beast.description: A creamy ale with strong vanilla flavors and aromas. It finishes with a warmth from the alcohol as well as the cinnamon. This is a surprisingly easy drinking beer and perfect for the winter cold.
kinkaider:snow-beast.name: Snow Beast Winter Ale

kinkaider:snozzberry.description: The Snozzberries taste like Snozzberries! A collaboration brewed with Local Patio and Kitchen.
kinkaider:snozzberry.name: Snozzberry

kinkaider:star-snake-dank.name: Star Snake Dank
kinkaider:star-snake-dank.description: A bright and fresh hopped IPA like our Star Snake Dank IPA pairs well with spicy foods to balance out the heat, or heavy and salty foods to counterbalance the taste.

kinkaider:tropicale.name: Devil's Gap Tropicale Jalapeño Guava
kinkaider:tropicale.description: Gap has been spending a lot of time close to the equator this winter and has taken an affinity for all flavors tropical! Pineapple and guava stood out as the front-runners to mix with our jalapeño ale to create Devil’s Gap TropicAle.

krosstrain:dad-jokes.description: Why Dad Jokes? Because they're Corny! Nebraska's first ever NEIPA (Nebraska IPA) made with flaked maize in the grain bill! Slightly sweet, but hopped with Cashmere, Centennial, Sabro and Zappa hops for the next big thing in IPA!
krosstrain:dad-jokes.name: Dad Jokes

krosstrain:ddh.description: The 2018 Juicy Hazy IPA category Silver Medalist at GABF is Back! With the extra dose of Citra and Mosaic hops, this juice bomb will deliver exactly what you are looking for! Hazy, juicy, and full of tropical and citrus flavor all with very low bitterness, this is a NEIPA that hits all the right notes!
krosstrain:ddh.name: Fairy Nectar Double Dry Hopped

krosstrain:fairy-nectar.description: Aromatic hops and notes of grapefruit, mango and tropical goodness fill this tasty IPA. Leaving very little bitterness behind.
krosstrain:fairy-nectar.name: Fairy Nectar IPA
krosstrain:fairy-nectar.line2: Aromatic, hints of critius and mango

krosstrain:helles-creek.description: Easy Drinking German Style lager light malt sweetness with no bitterness.
krosstrain:helles-creek.name: Helles Creek

krosstrain:hopstreaker.description: A late addition hop bursted pale ale using all Mosaic hops.
krosstrain:hopstreaker.name: Hopstreaker

krosstrain:krossteiner.description: A czech style pilsner with a 'keller' amount of haze! Dry hopped with saaz hops for the noblest of palates! A perfect pilsner for porches and patios! Na zdravi!
krosstrain:krossteiner.name: Krossteiner

krosstrain:nilla.name: Nilla Nectar
krosstrain:nilla.description: This small batch of our award winning Fairy Nectar was finished with freshly harvested vanilla caviar for a smooth, decadent IPA experience!

krosstrain:rules-dont-apply.name: Rules Don't Apply
krosstrain:rules-dont-apply.description: Do you make anything like a Hefeweizen?' We do now! Bright banana and clove flavors shine though from a yeast strain that's been used for generations

krosstrain:southern.description: Crikey, get the shrimp out and the barbie lit! Better than one of those big beers Australia is famous for, Southern Hopisphere is one of our juiciest IPAs yet! Packed with Galaxy and Vic Secret Hops, motueka, and nelson sauvin hops, you'll taste pineapple, mango, and citrus flavors in this brew!
krosstrain:southern.name: Southern Hopisphere

krosstrain:tan-limes.description: Break out the flip flops and uncover the pool, because the first taste of summer is here! We brewed our version of a Light Mexican Lager and added lime so you don't have to! Add just a touch of salt and all you need is a beach front view!
krosstrain:tan-limes.name: Tan Limes

krosstrain:web-of-lies.description: Our 'session' New England Double IPA is jam packed with Citra, Mosaic, and Sultana hops. Then for an extra juicy hit, we dry hopped with Sabro and Lotus.
krosstrain:web-of-lies.name: Web of Lies

lazyhorse:blood-orange.description: A delicious beer made with Blood oranges and Coriander. Delicious and easy drinking.
lazyhorse:blood-orange.name: Blood Orange

lazyhorse:reckless-ipa.description: This is a very balanced IPA with reduced bitterness and enhanced hop flavors and aromas. Fruity deliciousness balance out this unique IPA. If you're looking for piney dankness, this isn't the IPA for you. If you're looking for an easy drinking, palatable beer that doesn't blow out your taste buds.
lazyhorse:reckless-ipa.name: Reckless IPA

lazyhorse:salted-caramel.description: A light easy drinking beer with a touch of salt and a smooth caramel finish. Perfect for any season.
lazyhorse:salted-caramel.name: Salted Caramel Blonde

luckybucket:belly-flop.description: The sun is shining, the skies are clear blue and you can just about smell the barbecue grill and campfire. We crafted our Strawberry Blonde Ale, Belly Flop, for these moments. A crisp, tasty golden ale with a light touch of sweet strawberry puree, it's as easy and mellow as a lazy summer afternoon.
luckybucket:belly-flop.name: Belly Flop Strawberry Blonde Ale

luckybucket:blondeale.name: Blonde Ale
luckybucket:blondeale.description: A simple good, easy drinking beer, this is delicious, refreshing, and crisp.

luckybucket:evil.description: An Imperial Oatmeal Stout that is as unrelenting in flavor as it is unapologetic in it's bravado, Certified Evil is truly a legend.
luckybucket:evil.name: Certified Evil

luckybucket:groover.name: The Groover
luckybucket:groover.description: The mellow malt gets things moving while the funky hop bass line drops. Get a whiff and take a sip. Now you're in the groove! This is a smooth and hoppy IPA for your enjoyment.

luckybucket:jug.description: This burly brown ale is serving up rich, malty caramel with a shot of cocoa. Drink and be satisfied. Fortune favors the bold.
luckybucket:jug.name: Jug Thumper

luckybucket:oktoberfest.description: Using only the finest German malt and hops for a delicious malty flavor, full body, and crisp finish, even Prince Ludwig would trade his bride for this one.
luckybucket:oktoberfest.name: Oktoberfest

luckybucket:prohibition.description: Lucky Bucket claims this Pre-Prohibition Style lager is the smoothest most flavorful lager this side of the Mississipi. Combines 100% malted barley with the perfect amount of hops.
luckybucket:prohibition.name: Pre-Prohibition Lager

luckybucket:snowsuit.name: Snowsuit
luckybucket:snowsuit.description: Snowsuit ale is a spiced Belgian Abbey ale, brewed in the traditional style that goes back centuries, but with a fresh spin. Lucky Bucket uses a blend of six spices to perfectly accent fruity notes drived from Traditional Belgian Trappist yeast, bringing out the flavors of the season.

luckybucket:tropicwonder.description: When the sun sets, the party's just starting. A little bit of sweet and a little bit of spice is the perfect recipe for a good time.
luckybucket:tropicwonder.name: Tropic Wonder

luckybucket:wickedjoe.name: Wicked Joe
luckybucket:wickedjoe.description: This Imperial Oatmeal Stout has taken a turn for the wicked. After brooding in whiskey barrels and conspiring with coffee and vanilla, Certified Evil has emerged a seductive and menacing fiend.

nebrew:brunette.malts: Pale Ale, Aromatic, Oats, Caramel 60, Caramel 120, Chocolate
nebrew:brunette.description: Our version of the classic English-style Brown Ale has a blend of six different malts and a hop schedule that results in a low hop character. The unique malt character brings to mind the taste of a blend of various nuts. Coffee, toffee, caramel tend to come to mind in this excellent session Ale.
nebrew:brunette.name: Brunette Nut Brown
nebrew:brunette.line1: Pairs Well:BBQ, Pizza, Smoked Gouda Cheese, grilled/roasted/braised meats.

nebrew:cardinal.description: Our American Pale Ale is golden in color, mildly bitter, and characterized by floral/citrus-like aromatics which are the result of an additional dry hopping with a very large amount of Cascade Hops. Crisp, crystal clear, and completely enjoyable.
nebrew:cardinal.name: Cardinal Pale Ale

nebrew:eos.description: This medium to full-bodied beer, pale to golden in color, is most accurately described as a Bavarian wheat beer. The aroma and flavor of this unfiltered beer is decidedly fruity and spicy evoking tastes and aromas of cloves, nutmeg or sometimes vanilla with banana-like esters. Somewhat sweeter in style with a barely noticeable tartness. An award winning Hefeweizen from the heartland.
nebrew:eos.name: EOS Hefeweizen
nebrew:eos.line1: Pairs Well:Salads, Salmon, Seafood Appetizers, Cheeses such as Goat.

nebrew:ipa.line1: Foods created with spice. Curry, roasted meats, & BBQ.
nebrew:ipa.description: Our West Coast inspired India Pale Ale is rich in flavor and abundant in citrus, pine, and floral aromatics created through a wonderful infusion of Citra hops. Completely refreshing with a medium mouth-feel, crisp bitterness, and nearly balanced malt. Finishes dry with a head that creates excellent lacing. Beautifully Nebraskan.
nebrew:ipa.name: IPA

nebrew:pils.name: Nebraska Pils
nebrew:pils.description: Nebraska was home to many wonderful breweries before us. This Beer pays homage to some of The Choicest Products of the Brewers’ Art. Wonderfully bright and pale in color with a satisfying malt flavor. Classically Nebraskan.

nebrew:tacoveza.description: A thirst quenching light lager inspired by the finer pale lagers of Mexico. Flaked Maize compliments our 2-row barley malt to help keep this beer dry and refreshing and also lends its own subtle flavor to the brew. Find something spicy to eat and put out the fire with Tacoveza!
nebrew:tacoveza.name: Tacoveza

pintnine:brightside.description: Tart, earthy note, fruity, dry, refreshing honey ale
pintnine:brightside.name: Brightside Honey Hibiscus Ale

pintnine:cloudjumper.description: This New England Pale Ale is dry, has hints of citrus, and is crisp & velvety.
pintnine:cloudjumper.name: Cloud Jumper

pintnine:false-idol.description: This IPA features El Dprado, Citra and Idaho 7 hops and shows great flavors of tangerine, melon and pineapple.
pintnine:false-idol.name: False Idol

pintnine:ipa.name: IPA
pintnine:ipa.description: This IPA is contains stone fruits and is dry and hoppy

pintnine:osocoffee.description: This coffee brown ale has is rich & roasty and has hints of hazelnut.
pintnine:osocoffee.name: Oso Coffee

thunderhead:cornstalker.description: A Dark American Wheat. Clean, roasty, round. Brewed with malted Nebraska Corn. Surprisingly dry. Incredibly drinkable.
thunderhead:cornstalker.name: Cornstalker Dark Wheat

thunderhead:cropduster.description: Rusty color. Sweet malts for smell. Flavor is bold and sort of smoky with a good malty presence. Overall this a unique in a good way IPA.
thunderhead:cropduster.name: Cropduster Mid-American IPA

thunderhead:golden-frau.description: Brewed with sweet Nebraska Sand Hills honey
thunderhead:golden-frau.name: Golden Frau

thunderhead:jalapeno.description: The nice pepper flavor without a lot of heat, made with fresh jalapenos.
thunderhead:jalapeno.name: Jalapeno Ale

thunderhead:leatherhead.description: Malty English style red ale hopped with aged Willamette hops for a crisp finish
thunderhead:leatherhead.name: Leatherhead Red

thunderhead:prairiepeach.description: An American Wheat Ale made with Oregon Peaches.
thunderhead:prairiepeach.name: Prairie Peach

thunderhead:schabens.name: Schaben's Pilsner
thunderhead:schabens.description: A Southern German Style Pilsner.  Malty and Crisp.  This beer is step mashed and fermented cold.

thunderhead:thunder-punch-cherry.name: Thunder Punch Cherry
thunderhead:thunder-punch-cherry.description: A take on our original only cherry flavored. Hard Seltzer

thunderhead:thunder-punch-lime.name: Thunder Punch Lime
thunderhead:thunder-punch-lime.description: Like our original, but lime flavored. Hard Seltzer

whiteelm:atypical-deviation.description: A strong unique brew for the inquisitive at heart.
whiteelm:atypical-deviation.name: Atypical Deviation

whiteelm:chocolate.name: Chocolate Hazelnut Oatmeal Stout
whiteelm:chocolate.description: Double Oatmeal Stout made with Cacao Nibs, Hazelnut Flour, Milk Chocolate, Oats, and Lactose.

whiteelm:deadlines.name: Deadlines
whiteelm:deadlines.description: Fruit IPA made with copious amounts of pineapple and El Dorado and Citra hops.

whiteelm:harrow.description: Traditional Farmhouse style ale brewed with Wallonian saison yeast strain, Pilsner Barley, Wheat Malt, and Czech Saaz hops.
whiteelm:harrow.name: Harrow Saison

whiteelm:inverted.description: Hazy, juicy, imperial hopped up goodness!
whiteelm:inverted.name: Inverted Galaxy

whiteelm:inverted-mosaic.name: Inverted Mosaic Double IPA
whiteelm:inverted-mosaic.description: A strong double IPA for those who love complex hoppy flavors.

whiteelm:malverde.description: Mexican Style Lager made with Pilsner Malt, Corn, and Neomexicanus Hops
whiteelm:malverde.name: Malverde

whiteelm:mega-cd.name: Mega C & D Chocalate Sandwich Cookie Stout
whiteelm:mega-cd.description: As it turns out, a certain multi-national corporation was not so happy with our beer names, or at least one specifically. In honor of our first cease and desist, we brewed an imperial version of said now-nameless beer. Let's keep this imperial chocolate cookie sandwich beer on the low-low though, they seemed really serious. A strong stout not for the faith of heart.
whiteelm:mega-cd.beers: Mega C & D Chocalate Sandwich Cookie Stout

whiteelm:paradigm-shift.name: Paradigm Shift
whiteelm:paradigm-shift.description: A traveling companion of an IPA, Paradigm Shift offers all of the brilliant hop character of a more robust IPA in a sessionable package. Cheers to your next adventure.

whiteelm:pma.name: PMA - Positive Mental Attitude
whiteelm:pma.description: A unique American Pale Ale from yours truly.

whiteelm:prost.name: Prost!
whiteelm:prost.description: A silky smooth and pleasant festbier with hints of clove, banana, and vanilla bread.

whiteelm:rollo.description: Classic German malt bill meets American Equinox, Citra & El Dorado hops for a sessionable, aromatic flavor
whiteelm:rollo.name: Rollo

whiteelm:skinny-leg.description: This juicy and aromatic beer is brewed with Simcoe, Mosaic, Amarillo & Citra hops and balanced with pilsen malt and white wheat.
whiteelm:skinny-leg.name: Skinny Leg

whiteelm:small-batch.description: A small batch offering from White Elm. Call store or come in for more details.
whiteelm:small-batch.name: Small Batch Special

zipline:cloudlifter-hazy-ipa.description: Juicy pineapple and orange notes shine through in this cirrus-ly hazy, hoppy delight.
zipline:cloudlifter-hazy-ipa.name: Cloudlifter Hazy IPA

zipline:cloudlifter-tropical-hazy-ipa.name: Tropical Cloudlifter Hazy IPA
zipline:cloudlifter-tropical-hazy-ipa.description: We packed this Brave New Brew with pineapple and passionfruit puree, enhancing it’s already juicy hop flavors and aromas of our year round Cloudlifter Hazy IPA!

zipline:copper-alt.description: 2015 GREAT AMERICAN BEER FESTIVAL® · GOLD MEDAL · GERMAN-STYLE ALTBIER A hybrid style between an ale and a lager, this bronze-hued brew goes down easy with subtle nuances of chocolate and hazelnut.
zipline:copper-alt.malts: Pilsner, Carahell, Special B, Caramel, Carafa
zipline:copper-alt.name: Copper Alt.

zipline:daaang-ipa.name: DAAANG! IPA
zipline:daaang-ipa.description: This new American IPA is so dank and tangy its name was instantly obvious.

zipline:dear-old.name: Dear Old Nebraska Brew
zipline:dear-old.description: An American lager, it will be available initially on draft at the Champions Club and available for retail purchase in other locations around the state this fall. Zipline will donate a dollar from every case sold to support Nebraska alumni engagement programs.

zipline:dope-ipa.description: New-school meets old-school in this hoppy juice bomb.
zipline:dope-ipa.name: Dope IPA

zipline:easy-lift.name: Easy Lifting IPA
zipline:easy-lift.description: Drop the calories, but not the hops, and take it easy with this refreshing IPA.

zipline:festbier.name: Festbier
zipline:festbier.description: This golden lager was inspired by the beers served at the modern day Oktoberfest celebration in Munich. Drinks smooth and crisp with hearty malt flavor. Prost!

zipline:german-style-kolsch.description: A refreshing ale that drinks like a lager, our German-style Kölsch pours straw yellow with hints of honey malt character and a smooth, crisp finish.
zipline:german-style-kolsch.name: German-Style KÖLSCH
zipline:german-style-kolsch.malts: Pils, Munich & Local Organic White Wheat

zipline:gold-lager.name: Gold Lager
zipline:gold-lager.description: This refreshingly drinkable golden lager balances floral hop aroma with rich malt character.

zipline:hazy-ipa.description: Bright grapefruit and citrus aromas accentuate the smooth, juicy flavor of our flagship hazy IPA.
zipline:hazy-ipa.name: Hazy IPA

zipline:ipa.description: This bright, golden IPA overflows with juicy hops, showcasing a sublime blend of tropical citrus, grapefruit and mango aromas.
zipline:ipa.name: IPA

zipline:local-time.name: Local Time
zipline:local-time.description: When you want an easy drinking lager that’s low in calories but doesn’t sell out on taste, It’s Local Time.

zipline:milk-stout.name: Milk Stout
zipline:milk-stout.description: Silky milk sugar smoothes out the dark chocolate and coffee notes of this classic stout, making it the perfect fireside treat.

zipline:nz.name: NZ IPA
zipline:nz.description: Once the flagship beer of Zipline, the NZ IPA is back for a limited time. With heaps of Motueka, Rakau, and Wakatu, and that classic rich malt base, fans of our very first IPA will instantly suss out the unique flavors of citrus, honey and blackberry in this OG Zipline IPA.

zipline:oatmeal-porter.description: All the dark chocolate and coffee notes you expect from a porter with locally sourced, rolled oats delivering an uncommonly silky smooth finish.
zipline:oatmeal-porter.name: Oatmeal Porter
zipline:oatmeal-porter.malts: Chocolate, Munich, Caramel, Carafa, Organic Rolled Oats From Nebraska
